name: Superwhisper
description: Superwhisper is an AI-powered app for Mac that enables fast, offline voice-to-text transcription in any application to boost productivity.
longDescription: Superwhisper is an innovative AI-driven application designed specifically for macOS users, allowing them to dictate text offline using advanced voice recognition technology. It leverages models like OpenAI's Whisper to convert spoken words into accurate text without relying on cloud services, ensuring high privacy and speed. The app's mission is to revolutionize how users input text by making voice dictation seamless, efficient, and accessible in everyday workflows, such as writing emails, notes, or code. By solving issues like slow typing and the need for constant internet, Superwhisper empowers professionals, writers, and creators to work more productively and hands-free. It integrates directly with the Mac ecosystem, supporting multiple languages and customizable settings to fit individual needs.
features: Offline AI transcription processes voice input locally on your Mac, ensuring privacy and eliminating the need for an internet connection.
Seamless integration allows dictation in any app, from text editors to browsers, for versatile use across workflows.
High-accuracy voice-to-text conversion uses advanced models to minimize errors and support natural speaking speeds up to 150 words per minute.
Customizable hotkeys enable quick activation of dictation mode, making it easy to start and stop recording on demand.
Multi-language support handles transcription in various languages, benefiting global users and multilingual environments.
Privacy-focused design keeps all data on-device, preventing any transmission to external servers.
Real-time transcription provides instant text output, ideal for live note-taking or brainstorming sessions.
Lightweight app performance ensures it runs efficiently without draining system resources on Mac devices.
User-friendly interface simplifies setup and usage, with options to fine-tune models for better accuracy.

faqs.question: What is Superwhisper?
faqs.answer: Superwhisper is an AI app for Mac that transcribes voice to text offline, allowing users to dictate in any application for enhanced productivity.

faqs.question: Does Superwhisper require an internet connection?
faqs.answer: No, Superwhisper works entirely offline by processing audio locally on your Mac, ensuring privacy and reliability without internet dependency.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial for Superwhisper?
faqs.answer: Yes, Superwhisper offers a 7-day free trial to test its core features before purchasing a license.

faqs.question: What languages does Superwhisper support?
faqs.answer: Superwhisper supports multiple languages including English, Spanish, French, and more, with ongoing updates for additional ones.

faqs.question: How accurate is the transcription?
faqs.answer: The app uses advanced AI models for high accuracy, often exceeding 95% for clear speech, though it can vary based on accent and background noise.

faqs.question: Can Superwhisper be used for coding or professional writing?
faqs.answer: Yes, it's ideal for coding and writing as it allows hands-free input in any text field, supporting punctuation and formatting commands.

faqs.question: Is Superwhisper compatible with all Mac models?
faqs.answer: It works on most recent Mac models with macOS Ventura or later, but performance is best on devices with Apple Silicon for faster processing.

faqs.question: How does Superwhisper ensure data privacy?
faqs.answer: All transcription happens on-device without sending data to servers, keeping your voice recordings and text completely private.
